comments:
Refactoring: renamed a folder in the package explorer. This folder was outside
Java source (not a package) but inside the web content (renamed WEB-INF/taglib
to WEB-INF/tags).

The following exception was logged and the refactoring dialog was not closed.
Note that at refactoring there was only ONE editor open. The editor was the
plain text editor and the file existed within a subfolder of the renamed folder.

I believe this is fixed.

This part of the stack suggests a common problem users ran into a while back using
incompatible versions of JDT and WTP.

  - Caused by: java.lang.NoSuchFieldError: indexLocations

This bug was moved to 'closed' state, since it is so old and it is assumed really fixed and no longer useful or need further attention. Feel free to re-open, or open a new bug, if this semi-automatic processing was done in error.
